title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Evolution of industrial relations, IR system in India; Labour-management relations: trade unionism, collective bargaining, employee grievances, employee discipline, industrial conflict, labour welfare and social security; Workers participation in management; India and international labour standards; Judicial activism, alignment, labour policy and industrialization, strategies; New paradigms of industrial relations.
